title: This game is bugging me :/
body:
This game randomly crashes sometimes and I get put in _"low priority queue"_ (**_pff_**) even though I'm generally only dced for about **4 minutes**. It's getting really stupid and if there was some quick launch or reconnect button, it'd be great. Apparently, there used to be one, I'm not sure. I'm just _really_ pissed off about how unfair this system is.
{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
If you get disconnected during a match, the client should pop back up with a reconnect button that will try to get you back in the game. If that's not working, we may need to look into what's causing you to disconnect in the first place. 

Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down the main cause of your disconnecting.
